definitions.definition: (of a being) Lacking strength; weak; languid; inclined to lose consciousness
definitions.example: I felt faint after my fifth gin and tonic.

definitions.definition: Lacking courage, spirit, or energy; cowardly; dejected
Barely perceptible; not bright, or loud, or sharp
definitions.example: There was a faint red light in the distance.

definitions.definition: Performed, done, or acted, weakly; not exhibiting vigor, strength, or energy
